i1.name: Harrier
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''{{ci|Valor}}''' marks enemies hit by {{ai|Blinding Assault|Quinn}}, {{ai|Skystrike|Quinn}} or targeted by {{ai|Vault|Quinn}} as {{as|Vulnerable|gold}}, {{tip|sight|revealing}} them for 4 seconds. If no {{as|Vulnerable|gold}} target exists for 1 second, '''{{ci|Valor}}''' automatically marks a nearby visible enemy, but is not able to do so again for {{pp|type=critical strike chance|color=critical chance|8*(0.99^((x-1)*10))|key1=%|0 to 100 by 10|formula=8*(0.99^critical strike chance %)}} seconds after the mark has timed out, was consumed or was overwritten by another mark.

'''Quinn's''' next [[basic attack]] [[on-hit]] against a {{as|Vulnerable|gold}} target consumes the mark to deal {{pp|10 to 95|color=physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|16 to 50}} AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
While {{ai|Behind Enemy Lines|Quinn}} is active, ''Harrier'' is disabled and all {{as|Vulnerable|gold}} marks are removed.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Valor marks enemies hit by Blinding Assault, Skystrike or targeted by Vault as Vulnerable, revealing them for 4 seconds. If no Vulnerable target exists for 1 second, Valor automatically marks a nearby visible enemy, but is not able to do so again for 0 to 100 by 10 ‒ undefined seconds after the mark has timed out, was consumed or was overwritten by another mark.
Quinn's next basic attack on-hit against a Vulnerable target consumes the mark to deal 10undefined − 95undefined (based on level) (+ 16% − 50% (based on level) AD) bonus physical damage.
While Behind Enemy Lines is active, Harrier is disabled and all Vulnerable marks are removed.
i1.notes:
* If a mark applied by an ability is overwritten, consumed, or timed out, ''Harrier'' goes on a 1-second cooldown if it's not already on cooldown.
* ''Harrier's'' targeting priority:
*# Last unit hit (if it was a small minion it appears to select a different target).
*# Lowest-health enemy champion.
*# Lowest-health enemy minion.
* ''Harrier'' is consumed even if it is parried, the attack is negated in any case.

q1.name: Blinding Assault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Quinn''' signals '''{{ci|Valor}}''' to fly forward in a line in the target direction, stopping upon colliding with an enemy unit, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to them and all nearby enemies and applying {{tip|nearsight}} to the target for {{fd|1.75}} seconds.
Non-[[champion]] targets are {{tip|disarm|disarmed}} instead for the same duration.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Quinn signals Valor to fly forward in a line in the target direction, stopping upon colliding with an enemy unit, dealing physical damage to them and all nearby enemies and applying nearsight to the target for 1.75 seconds.
Non-champion targets are disarmed instead for the same duration.
The nearsight persists through death.
q1.notes: * ''Blinding Assault'' is always cast from the original casting position.

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ % AD) (+ 50% AP)

w1.name: Heightened Senses
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Attacking a {{ai|Harrier|Quinn|Vulnerable}} target grants '''Quinn''' {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Quinn''' orders '''{{ci|Valor}}''' to {{tip|sight|reveal}} the area around her for 2 seconds.
Enemies spotted are {{tip|sight|revealed}} for {{fd|2.75}} seconds, reduced to 2 seconds for {{tip|champions}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Attacking a Vulnerable target grants Quinn bonus attack speed and bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
Active: Quinn orders Valor to reveal the area around her for 2 seconds.
Enemies spotted are revealed for 2.75 seconds, reduced to 2 seconds for champions.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|20 to 80}}%}}<!--
-->{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|20 to 40}}%}}

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %

  • Bonus Movement Speed: %

e1.name: Vault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Quinn''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy unit, {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}}, dealing them {{as|physical damage}}, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 50% which decays over {{fd|1.5}} seconds, before {{tip|dash|leaping back}} and landing 525 units away from them.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Quinn dashes to the target enemy unit, knocking them back, dealing them physical damage, and slowing them by 50% which decays over 1.5 seconds, before leaping back and landing 525 units away from them.
e1.notes:
* '''Quinn''' will automatically attempt to attack the target once she completes ''Vault''.
* The target will turn to face the opposite direction after being {{tip|airborne|knocked back}}.
* Unlike its constant cast range ''Vault's'' bounce's can vary to allow '''Quinn''' to close or to make a gap between herself and the target (depending on casting position) or even to jump through a wall (if there is enough landing room on the other side).
* '''Quinn''' will track and follow the target if they move through {{tip|dash|dashes}} and {{tip|blink|blinks}}.
** This will not occur if the target is travelling to a very far distance (e.g, {{si|Recall}}, {{si|Teleport}}, {{ai|Stand United|Shen}}).
* ''Vault'' also interrupts {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable basic attacks}} from affecting their target.{{bug|2}}
